entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
